{% comment %} Version 0 https://github.com/allejo/jekyll-toc "...like all things liquid - where there's a will, and ~36 hours to spare, there's usually a/some way" ~jaybe Usage: {% include image.html html=content %} Parameters: * html (string) - the HTML of compiled markdown generated by kramdown in Jekyll Output: An ordered or unordered list representing the table of contents of a markdown block. This snippet will only generate the table of contents and will NOT output the markdown given to it {% endcomment %}
